text.div:
Generated Narrative

url: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7dk/dk-medcom/

version: 0.1.0

name: Patient is in an emergency outpatient setting ay hospital, but ends up being admitted

title: Patient is in an emergency outpatient setting ay hospital, but ends up being admitted

status: active

date: 2021-11-01

publisher: MedCom

contact: MedCom: fhir@medcom.dk

description: Testing correct use of emergency admit and discharge

copyright: MedCom 2021

Origins

-IndexProfile
*1FHIR Client

Destinations

-IndexProfile
*1FHIR Server

fixture

autocreate: false

autodelete: false

resource: /FHIRSandbox/MedCom/401-Acknowledgement/_reference/resources/Acknowledgement-ok.xml

fixture

autocreate: false

autodelete: false

resource: /FHIRSandbox/MedCom/401-Hospitalnotification/receive/Userstory/_reference/resources/STIN_2.xml

fixture

autocreate: false

autodelete: false

resource: /FHIRSandbox/MedCom/401-Hospitalnotification/receive/Userstory/_reference/resources/STAA_2.xml

profile: http://medcomfhir.dk/fhir/core/1.0/StructureDefinition/medcom-hospitalNotification-message

variable

name: destinationUri1

expression: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).destination.endpoint

sourceId: bundle-create-STIN1

variable

name: KorrektMHID1

expression: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Bundle).id

sourceId: bundle-get-STIN1

variable

name: MessageHeaderIdentifier1

expression: Bundle.entry[0].fullUrl

sourceId: bundle-create-STIN1

variable

name: ProvenanceID1

expression: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).id

sourceId: bundle-create-STIN1

variable

name: destinationUri2

expression: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).destination.endpoint

sourceId: bundle-create-STAA2

variable

name: KorrektMHID2

expression: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Bundle).id

sourceId: bundle-get-STAA2

variable

name: MessageHeaderIdentifier2

expression: Bundle.entry[0].fullUrl

sourceId: bundle-create-STAA2

variable

name: ProvenanceID2

expression: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).id

sourceId: bundle-create-STAA2

setup

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptEncodeRequestUrlParams
*DeleteBundleSystem-generated search and delete operations from conditional delete on Bundle MessageHeader).destination.endpointxmltrue?message.destination-uri=${destinationUri1}

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptContentTypeEncodeRequestUrlSourceId
*CreateBundleCreate the Bundle resource in XML format on the destination server.xmlxmltruebundle-create-STIN1

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptEncodeRequestUrlParams
*DeleteBundleSystem-generated search and delete operations from conditional delete on Bundle MessageHeader).destination.endpointxmltrue?message.destination-uri=${destinationUri2}

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptContentTypeEncodeRequestUrlSourceId
*CreateBundleCreate the Bundle resource in XML format on the destination server.xmlxmltruebundle-create-STAA2

test

name: HospitalNotification-STIN

description: GET a Hospital notification STIN. The expected response is a 200(OK) with a payload of the Hospital notification resource in XML format.

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptDestinationEncodeRequestUrlOriginParamsResponseId
*ReadBundleReceive notification-STINxml1true1?message.destination-uri=${destinationUri1}bundle-get-STIN1

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionResponseCodeWarningOnly
*Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).response200false

test

name: 1 Post Acknowledgement-bundle-create-STIN1

description: GET ACK

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptDestinationEncodeRequestUrlOriginSourceId
*CreateBundlePost a acknowledgementxml1true1bundle-create-ack-OK

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionResourceWarningOnly
*Confirm that the client request payload contains a Bundle resource type.requestBundlefalse

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionOperatorValueWarningOnly
*Confirm that the MessageHeader response code is OKrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).response.codeequalsokfalse

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the request resource contains the expected evetCoding code.requestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).event.as(Coding).select(code = 'acknowledgment-message').allTrue()false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the Bundle not containing a OperationOutcomerequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(OperationOutcome).exists().not()false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionOperatorValueWarningOnly
*Confirm that the MessageHeader.response.identifier is equal to Id of original message requestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).response.identifierequals${KorrektMHID1}false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the reference original Provenance.entity.what is equal to Id of original messageheader.identifierrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).where(entity.what.reference ='${MessageHeaderIdentifier1}')false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the there are two ProvenancesrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).count() = 2false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the id of the original message provenance exist in the ackrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).where(id='${ProvenanceID1}').exists()false

test

name: HospitalNotification-STAA

description: GET a Hospital notification STAA. The expected response is a 200(OK) with a payload of the Hospital notification resource in XML format.

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptDestinationEncodeRequestUrlOriginParamsResponseId

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionResponseCodeWarningOnly
*Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).response200false

test

name: 2 Post Acknowledgement-bundle-create-STAA2

description: GET ACK

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptDestinationEncodeRequestUrlOriginSourceId
*CreateBundlePost a acknowledgementxml1true1bundle-create-ack-OK

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionResourceWarningOnly
*Confirm that the client request payload contains a Bundle resource type.requestBundlefalse

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionOperatorValueWarningOnly
*Confirm that the MessageHeader response code is OKrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).response.codeequalsokfalse

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the request resource contains the expected evetCoding code.requestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).event.as(Coding).select(code = 'acknowledgment-message').allTrue()false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the Bundle not containing a OperationOutcomerequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(OperationOutcome).exists().not()false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionOperatorValueWarningOnly
*Confirm that the MessageHeader.response.identifier is equal to Id of original message requestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).response.identifierequals${KorrektMHID2}false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the reference original Provenance.entity.what is equal to Id of original messageheader.identifierrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).where(entity.what.reference ='${MessageHeaderIdentifier2}')false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the there are two ProvenancesrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).count() = 2false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the id of the original message provenance exist in the ackrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).where(id='${ProvenanceID2}').exists()false

test.name: HospitalNotification-STIN
test.description: GET a Hospital notification STIN. The expected response is a 200(OK) with a payload of the Hospital notification resource in XML format.

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the client request payload contains a Bundle resource type.
Confirm that the MessageHeader response code is OK
Confirm that the request resource contains the expected evetCoding code.
Confirm that the Bundle not containing a OperationOutcome
Confirm that the MessageHeader.response.identifier is equal to Id of original message
Confirm that the reference original Provenance.entity.what is equal to Id of original messageheader.identifier
Confirm that the there are two Provenances
Confirm that the id of the original message provenance exist in the ack
